summary: Defines a collection of neural network modules and utilities for constructing Stable Diffusion style diffusion models, including attention mechanisms, encoder/decoder stacks, residual blocks, up/downâ€‘sampling layers, and latent rescaling components, together with helper functions for normalization and timestep embeddings.
business_intent: Enable developers to build and integrate generative AI pipelines for image synthesis using the Stable Diffusion architecture within the NVIDIA NeMo multimodal framework.
